SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.nickname, u.phone, u.email, u.avatar, u.status, u.created_at FROM sys_user_tenant AS ut LEFT JOIN sys_user AS u ON u.id = ut.user_id
LEFT JOIN tenant_user_dept_private AS ud ON ud.user_id = u.id
LEFT JOIN tenant_role_user_private AS ru ON ru.user_id = u.id
WHERE ut.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND u.deleted_at IS NULL
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition.username}, '%')
AND u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition.nickname}, '%')
AND u.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition.phone}, '%')
AND u.status = #{condition.status}
AND ud.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND ud.dept_id = #{condition.deptId}
AND ru.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND ru.role_id = #{condition.roleId}
ORDER BY ut.id
